title: DevOps Engineer (Linux Background) - Digital Agency
body:
DevOps Engineer (Linux Background) - Digital Agency

Central Linz - Competitive rates - Remote Start

Remote start as a mid-level Devops engineer in Linz with the view to work in Switzerland and Germany. This software consultancy has a well established history of working along side some of Europe's best known tech companies to improve, enhance and integrate software solutions.

In this role you will have the chance to work on a variety of IT security, database and migration projects having a vital impact on European markets. On top of this, as a permanent employee, you will enjoy a stable position, competitive rates and a great chance to grow your skills/ experience.

Your tasks will require a strong knowledge of Linux and system engineering. Database experience is a highly valued tool. On top of this you will most likely have a background or a strong interest in IT security.

Skills:

- Development, monitoring and testing (in the devops lifecycle)

- A good background in development and a strong knowledge of Linux OS.

- At least 2 years in a DevOps background.

A part of this role you will have flexible working hours, 2 days a month of remote work and quick progression.

Apply now for more information.

Benefits:

  • Work from home opportunities
  • Flexible working hours

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: 45,000.00€ to 55,000.00€ /day

Experience:

  • DevOps: 1 year (Required)
